messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to a breakout on a top secret prison a extremely dangerous prisoner escaped in this sector and the last tracked coordinates point to the planet you are orbiting right now Lavaland if you spot this dangerous man immediately call us.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: My office is open, come and get your all-access

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I meant to announce that lmao

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we have deployed an army of cleanbots to your station to clean it up

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we may have accidently deployed about 65 cleanbots

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: there have been some accidental clusterbuster deployments upon your station expect more dave accidently pressed scuttle
